title: Fast coq au vin blanc
directions: Cut the celery into thin arches. Cut the carrots into thin slices and chop the onion. Ris half the leaves from the thyme sprigs.
Heat a large heavy-based pan and fry the bacon for 1 min. On medium heat. Add the chicken and cook for 2 min. Until golden brown over high heat. Remove the chicken from the pan.

Add the vegetables and thyme to the bacon and cook 3 min. On medium heat. Stir frequently. Pour in the wine and add after 1 min. The cream and chicken. Oven with the lid on for 15 minutes. On low heat. Stir frequently.
Meanwhile, prepare the puree according to the directions on the package in the microwave. Garnish the coq au vin with the rest of the thyme and serve.
